subsections.title: Capacitors
subsections.label: subsec:capacitors
prompts: Explain the concept of capacitance and its role in storing energy in an electric field.
Describe the unit of capacitance, the farad, and its significance in electrical circuits.

image_prompts.prompt: Diagram showing a capacitor in a circuit and its electric field.
image_prompts.caption: Capacitor in a circuit with electric field representation.
image_prompts.label: fig:capacitor-circuit

table_prompt.prompt: Table comparing capacitance values for different types of capacitors.
table_prompt.caption: Comparison of capacitance values for various capacitor types.
table_prompt.label: tab:capacitance-values

subsections.title: Inductors
subsections.label: subsec:inductors
prompts: Explain the concept of inductance and its role in storing energy in a magnetic field.
Describe the unit of inductance, the henry, and its significance in electrical circuits.

image_prompts.prompt: Diagram showing an inductor in a circuit and its magnetic field.
image_prompts.caption: Inductor in a circuit with magnetic field representation.
image_prompts.label: fig:inductor-circuit

table_prompt.prompt: Table comparing inductance values for different types of inductors.
table_prompt.caption: Comparison of inductance values for various inductor types.
table_prompt.label: tab:inductance-values

subsections.title: Impedance, Reactance, etc.
subsections.label: subsec:imp-react
prompts: Explain the concept of impedance and its role in opposing AC current flow.
Describe the unit of impedance, the ohm, and its significance in AC circuits.
Discuss the difference between impedance and reactance.

image_prompts.prompt: Diagram showing impedance in an AC circuit.
image_prompts.caption: Impedance in an AC circuit.
image_prompts.label: fig:impedance-circuit

table_prompt.prompt: Table comparing impedance values for different circuit components.
table_prompt.caption: Comparison of impedance values for various circuit components.
table_prompt.label: tab:impedance-values

subsections.title: RF and Frequency Abbreviations
subsections.label: subsec:rf-abbrev
prompts: Explain the abbreviation 'RF' and its significance in radio frequency signals.
Describe the abbreviations for megahertz (MHz) and kilohertz (kHz) and their usage in frequency measurement.

image_prompts.prompt: Diagram showing the frequency spectrum with RF, MHz, and kHz labeled.
image_prompts.caption: Frequency spectrum with RF, MHz, and kHz labeled.
image_prompts.label: fig:frequency-spectrum

table_prompt.prompt: Table showing common RF and frequency abbreviations.
table_prompt.caption: Common RF and frequency abbreviations.
table_prompt.label: tab:rf-abbreviations

subsections.title: Calculating Power with Voltage/Current
subsections.label: subsec:calc-power
prompts: Explain the formula for calculating electrical power in a DC circuit (P = I E).
Provide examples of calculating power using voltage and current values.
Discuss the relationship between power, voltage, and current in electrical circuits.

image_prompts.prompt: Diagram showing a simple DC circuit with voltage, current, and power labeled.
image_prompts.caption: Simple DC circuit with voltage, current, and power labeled.
image_prompts.label: fig:dc-circuit

table_prompt.prompt: Table showing power calculations for different voltage and current values.
table_prompt.caption: Power calculations for various voltage and current values.
table_prompt.label: tab:power-calculations
